content: shoot for the stars that shine brightly on these eye-catching crochet dishcloths stitched in 100% cotton lily sugar n cream this simple yet striking pattern features colorwork double_crochet around front post double_crochet treble_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet working in the round and more with a wide range of classic and trendy shades you can create a set of star-studded dishcloths and give it to your favorite hostess materials lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m main color mc black 00002 2 balls or 200 yds/183 m contrast a hot pink 01740 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m contrast b soft violet 00093 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m contrast c hot orange 01628 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m contrast d seabreeze 01201 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m contrast e robin s egg 01215 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m contrast f hot green 01712 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m measurement approx 7 18 cm square
